caption.p: Angiography and PCI for RCA. (a) No evidence of coronary atherosclerosis of left coronary. (b) Acute thrombotic occlusion of RCA. (c) Diffuse intracoronary thrombosis of RCA. (d) Thrombus aspiration using a 6â€‰F Guideliner. (e) Persistent diffuse intracoronary thrombosis. (f) Distal tip injection, no coronary atherosclerosis. (g) Result. (h) Thrombus removed [Color figure can be viewed at wileyonlinelibrary.com]
